sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>2</base_damage> <critical_rating>3</critical_rating> <defense/> <description>The Tusken Raiders of Tatooine carry brutal staves made from desert tracti hardwood, krayt dragon horn or bone, or scavenged metal. One end of the gaffi stick is flanged with four protruding blades useful for cutting and gashing opponents. The other end curves outward and ends in a spike of some sort, with the opposite side serving as a dull club. While to some the gaffi stick seems crude, its genius is its versatilityâ€”being able to stab, cut, or club depending on how the user wields it.   It has practical uses as well, from serving as a walking stick in the rough terrain of Tatooine to guiding the Tusken Raiders' massive banthas. Gaffi sticks require two hands to wield.</description> <encumbrance>3</encumbrance> <hard_points>0</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Gaffi Stick</name> <number>GEAR0001025</number> <price>100</price> <range>engaged</range> <rarity>2</rarity> <skill_used display_value="Melee (Br)">0c90dd5cdbae88542901de90cf9619a4</skill_used> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 15:39:41</sys_created_on> <sys_id>001f62a02f50a450e0f497eef699b6d4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 15:39:41</sys_updated_on> <type>weapon</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
